#397 0' 3.9"
75.62 lbs. 		Luring Pokémon Being consumed in Chandelure's flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind. By waving the flames on its arms, it puts its foes into a hypnotic trance.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Cost Description
1 Flash Fire 3 Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.
1 Flame Body 3 Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
18 Illuminate 2 Raises the Pokémon's evasiveness.
36 Liquid Ooze 2 The oozed liquid has a strong stench, which damages attackers using draining moves.
54 Infiltrator 3 Passes through the opposing Pokémon's barrier, substitute, and the like and strikes.
72 Shadow Shield 15 Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
90 Shadow Tag 15 This Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon's shadow to prevent it from escaping.
100 Victory Star 5 Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Cost Description
Disc 04 Insomnia 2 The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.
Disc 05 Immunity 2 The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.
Disc 14 Flash Fire 3 Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.
Disc 16 Lifelink 2 The Pokémon may restore some of its HP after making contact.
Disc 23 Shadow Tag 15 This Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon's shadow to prevent it from escaping.
Disc 25 Levitate 3 By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
Disc 51 Cecity -5 This Pokémon's poor eyesight makes its moves more likely to miss.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Cost Description
Aftermath 2 Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.
Calderize 15 Normal-type moves become Fire-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Cursed Body 2 May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
Defeatist -10 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Flame Body 3 Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
Illuminate 2 Raises the Pokémon's evasiveness.
Infiltrator 3 Passes through the opposing Pokémon's barrier, substitute, and the like and strikes.
Klutz -4 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Liquid Ooze 2 The oozed liquid has a strong stench, which damages attackers using draining moves.
Predictable -2 This Pokémon's predictable maneuvers make moves hit against it without fail.
Refraction 5 Boosts the power of Beam-type moves.
Shadow Shield 15 Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
Slow Start -3 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Soundproof 3 Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.
Stall -3 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Terrorize 15 Normal-type moves become Ghost-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Victory Star 5 Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.
Wispy Form 3 The Pokémon creates a thick fog when it's hit by an attack.
Ghastly Guard 2 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Eerie Terrain.
Volt Absorb 3 Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.
Drought 16 Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Eerie Surge 16 Turns the ground into Eerie Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Magma Surge 16 Turns the ground into Magma Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Mega Launcher 5 Powers up aura and pulse moves.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
